author: ahinzmann
body:
Add test configuration for jet tools to run on top of MiniAOD.
The configuration is equivalent to "RecoJets/JetProducers/test/testJetTools_cfg.py" which runs on top of AOD.
Also update JEC payload in testJetTools_cfg.py and drop testing of btagging (that is tested in PhysicsTools/PatAlgos anyways).
title: Add test configuration for jet tools from MiniAOD
